q: During an appearance on The Late Show with David Letterman , the actor said that he plans to tie the knot in February, despite the fact that his divorce from ex Camille Grammer is not yet finalised. Kayte Walsh 's my new girl, and we're planning to get married soon, he told David Letterman . of The X Factor in 2007. Discussing his boss with New! magazine, Dermot O'Leary praised Simon Cowell for having time for everyone. " Simon Cowell is a remarkably surprising, down-to-earth man," he said. You don't get that level of success if you haven't got a touch of normality. "He's very much a common man, someone you could go for a beer with and who you'd have no hesitation in talking to about anything at all. I clicked with him immediately. He is a really nice guy, not affected, and has time for everyone. He's a showman but his head's not in the clouds. He is not aloof. several shock-blocking sports pads. When Michael Vick returned after missing three games with a rib injury, he wore a vest designed by Unequal.
